sense.name: Physically carve or etch something into a material surface.
sense.examples: They engraved the trophy with the winner's name. I engraved the design into the metal. The lovers engraved their names on the side of the tree.

sense.name: Impress or affect deeply (emotionally).
sense.examples: The event engraved itself into her memory. The memory of that day engraved itself upon my mind. He engraved the image in his mind.
